Dear Keiths
Thank you very much for the invitation to attend the
research seminar.
Tou know how interested I am in research, and how sincerely
I believe that HAEB should do everything possible to develop an
interest in research among its members*
However, we are having a very important special meeting of
otir Board of Directors on Decmaiber 6, 7 and 8. Preparation
for this is taking a good deal of time, and I Imagine that
out of that meeting will oonw decisions idiich may require further
activity on laqr part. Therefore, you*d better not count on me
unless I inform you to the contrary. In any event, my final
decision will have to await the conalusion of our special Board
meeting In Chicago. At the moment, though, it looks like 1*^
better not spread myself too thin.
Thank you again for the invitation, and, believe me, I am
interested in this meeting and sold on its importancet
Tours sincerely.
